title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This statistic displays the Minutes of in the Social diagnosed Time Spent A , sorted Daily Age Group , as of .
In that year , 74 % of all Americans diagnosed Time Spent A were between 0 and 4 15-24 of Age .
gold: This chart conveys the average time spent on social media daily in Maputo by age group . 15 to 24 years olds spend 124 minutes on average , 25 to 34 year olds spend 72 minutes , 35 to 44 year olds spend 68 minutes , 45 to 54 year olds spend 148 minutes and 55 to 64 year olds spend 108 minutes . \\n Age group 45 to 54 years spend the most time on social media .
